Hi,

Not entirely sure if this is the right place to post this, but in the
=
JUnit cookbook, the instructions for running a test from the command
line a=
re wrong or misleading, at least for JUnit 4.6.

or this from the command l=
ine, with both your test class and junit on
the classpath:

=A0 =A0java org=
.junit.runner.JUnitCore TestClass1.class [...other test classes...]


The c=
ommand should probably read:

=A0 =A0java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore packag=
e.TestClass1 [...other test
classes...]



-- Sam
subject: JUnit cookbook error?
